EditTextPreference.android:summary: The email ID registered with Note It! This email ID also will be used in case you should forget your password.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Remember Me
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Note It! will not remember your login information. You will have to use your credentials everytime.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Note It! will remember your login infotmation and sign you in automatically.

ListPreference.android:summary: The default currency you want to use.

ListPreference.android:title: Measurement Units
ListPreference.android:summary: Whether distance is measured in Miles or Kilometers. Weight in pounds or kilograms etc.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show suggestions
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Note It will not display suggestions as you type item names
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Note It will search its extensive database for products and display suggestions as you type.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Delete all items on list
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: If a list has items in it, it cannot be deleted.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Deleting a list deletes all items in the list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display on Startup
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: When Note It is launched, it will open with your last used Shopping List.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: When Note It is started, it will display all your Shopping Lists.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Price and Quantity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Displays only the item's name in the list.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Displays the price and quantity of the item, if available. Also computes Total price.

ListPreference.android:title: Item Font Size
ListPreference.android:summary: The size of the font used to display items in the list

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Delete bought Items
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: When an item is marked done, it won't be deleted from the list.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Marking an item done, deletes it from the list.
